content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: chiseled_nether_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 12, "index": 21}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 43, "index": 25}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 27, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft chiseled_nether_bricks, I need to craft a nether_brick_slab first. To craft a nether_brick_slab, I need to place 3 nether_bricks in the crafting grid, therefore I will first move one of the nether_bricks at slot 11 into the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: chiseled_nether_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 12, "index": 21}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 43, "index": 25}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 27, "index": 42}]

thought: I have moved 1 nether_bricks into the crafting grid at slot 1, I now need to move 2 more nether_bricks into the crafting grid, therefore I will move one of the nether_bricks at slot 11 into the crafting grid at slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: chiseled_nether_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 12, "index": 21}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 43, "index": 25}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 27, "index": 42}]

thought: I have moved 2 nether_bricks into the crafting grid at slots 1 and 2, I now need to move the last nether_bricks into the crafting grid, therefore I will move one of the nether_bricks at slot 11 into the crafting grid at slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: chiseled_nether_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 12, "index": 21}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 43, "index": 25}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 27, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I can craft the nether_brick_slab by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
